You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesV V] > &vBar;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Vbar;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2aeb/index.htm U+02AEB].
  * `&vBar;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ae8/index.htm U+02AE8].
